description: A dashboard that monitors Kubernetes and focuses on giving a overview for vertical pod recommender.

panels.description: Sum Req - Sum Target with taking into accounts replicas
panels.title: Gain Req
CPU Usage, Requests, Limits vs VPR Recommendations

targets.legendFormat: VPR JVM Old Gen After Full GC

targets.expr: max(sum by(pod,container)(jvm_memory_pool_used_bytes{pod=~"$podGroup-.*",container="$container",pool=~"PS Old Gen|G1 Old Gen|CMS Old Gen|ZHeap|old|Tenured Gen|ZGC Old Generation"}))
max(sum by(pod,container)(jvm_memory_used_after_gc_bytes{pod=~"$podGroup-.*",container="$container",key=~"PS Old Gen|G1 Old Gen|CMS Old Gen|ZHeap|old|Tenured Gen|ZGC Old Generation"}))

panels.title: Memory Usage, Requests, Limits vs VPR Recommendations

title: Vertical Pod Recommender
